general.description: Thurnae means "Rewards". The station was built by an independant rith faction that preyed on space traffic : basically space pirates. It was later handed over to the Irilia Clan. It is now an outpost between the Rith and Human Spheres.
general.bar: A crowd of Rithai and Humans Spacers, and a few Rithai officials displaying emblems of Irilia subclans.
